footer.companyDescription:
Solomon Partners (WEETOO_We are investors) is a crypto-related information and community platform designed for the general public. The main purpose of this site is to provide information, support community engagement, and offer a simulated trading system. It is not involved in actual investment brokerage, advisory services, trade inducement, or profit guarantees.

WEETOO does not engage in any activities that fall under financial services, such as investment solicitation or financial product sales.
footer.addressDetails:
3012-53, 30th floor, Building A,
323 Incheon Tower-daero, Yeonsu-gu,
Incheon (Songdo-dong, Songdo Cent Road)
footer.riskNoticeParagraph1:
â–  Nature of the Service 
 - Solomon Partners (WEE TOO â€“ "We Are Investors") is a content service aimed at investment education and information provision. Our company is a "similar investment advisory business" under the Capital Markets Act. We do not engage in financial investment business under the Capital Markets Act (such as investment brokerage, investment advisory, or discretionary investment business), and we do not conduct actual brokerage, solicitation, or discretionary trading. 
 - We only provide information services related to virtual assets. We are not a virtual asset service provider under the Virtual Asset User Protection Act and do not engage in the buying, selling, exchanging, or safekeeping of virtual assets. All information provided is for reference only and does not constitute investment advice or trading instructions.
footer.riskNoticeParagraph2:
â–  Investor Suitability 
 - Margin trading and overseas futures trading are high-risk, high-return financial derivatives, suitable only for investors with sufficient experience and risk tolerance. Due to the nature of leveraged products, losses can exceed the initial investment amount. Before deciding to trade Forex or any other financial products, you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite. All losses from investment are solely borne by the investor.
footer.riskNoticeParagraph3:
â–  Investment Risk Disclosure 
 - All trade records, signals, and investment information we provide are educational and informational mock-investment content and are not actual investment advice or trading instructions. Investors should use this information for reference only, and all investment decisions must be made based on their own independent judgment. 
 - Please note that all losses resulting from investments are solely borne by the investor. 
 The use of undisclosed material information, market manipulation, and unfair trading practices are strictly prohibited under relevant laws. Investors must comply with applicable regulations when trading.
footer.riskNoticeParagraph4:
â–  Risk Disclaimer 
 - We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the information we provide (including market news, analysis, trading signals, and Forex broker reviews) or the information contained on our website, and we are not responsible for any losses or damages arising from reliance on such information. 
 - The information or data we provide may not be real-time or may be inaccurate, and any investment or trading analysis represents the personal opinion of the author and does not constitute a recommendation from our company or its employees. 
 - We strive to provide valuable information and, to offer our free service, we receive advertising fees from some foreign brokerage firms listed on our rankings and web pages. While we make every effort to ensure that all information and data are up to date, it is recommended that you confirm the accuracy of important details directly with the relevant companies.
footer.copyrightText: Solomon Partners (WEETOO_We are investors). All rights reserved.

broker.title: Partner Exchange Comparison
broker.description: Compare cryptocurrency exchanges - fees, features, security, and trading pairs

exchange.scoreAutoCalculated: Score is automatically calculated based on payback rate, trading discount, fees, and events
exchange.tagsHelp: Select up to four tags per exchange. Click to toggle. If none selected, BASIC will be applied automatically.

paybackNotice.title: Payback Benefit Notice
paybackNotice.description: After creating your broker account using the WEETOO referral code, you must register your UID immediately to receive your payback benefits.
paybackNotice.warning: If you register your UID more than 90 days after joining, any trading activity that occurred during that period cannot be retrieved or included in your payback calculation due to broker API limitations.

descriptions.bybit: Bybit is a global futures exchange chosen by millions of users worldwide. It offers a powerful order matching engine, a variety of derivatives, options, and copy trading features. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.okx: OKX is one of the top global exchanges, offering spot, futures, and options trading, as well as DeFi, NFT, and other crypto ecosystem services. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.bitget: Bitget is a leading copy trading exchange, popular for allowing beginners to follow expert strategies. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.bingx: BingX is a community-driven global exchange known for its intuitive interface and strong copy trading features. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.deepcoin: DeepCoin is a global derivatives-focused exchange offering a wide range of leverage and derivative products. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.orangex: OrangeX is a rapidly growing next-generation exchange that supports spot, futures, and copy trading, and operates globally in over 20 languages. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.lbank: LBank is a platform that lists a wide variety of altcoins from around the world, offering opportunities to trade rare coins. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.gateio: Gate.io is a long-established exchange in the global crypto market, known for its stability and high liquidity, supporting a wide variety of coins. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.
descriptions.binance: Binance is the world's largest exchange, boasting billions of dollars in daily trading volume and the largest global user base. In addition to spot, futures, and options trading, it offers Launchpad, Earn, NFT, and other services, leading the crypto ecosystem. It supports the Travel Rule, providing a secure trading environment.

paybackWithdrawal.title: Request Rebate Withdrawal
paybackWithdrawal.description: Withdraw your broker rebates to your registered UID. Minimum withdrawal amount is $50.

emptyState.title: No UIDs with sufficient balance (â‰¥$50) found.
emptyState.description: Link a UID and earn rebates to make withdrawals.

withdrawalStatus.title: Withdrawal Status
withdrawalStatus.description: Track the status of your rebate withdrawal requests

emptyState.title: No withdrawal requests
emptyState.description: You haven't submitted any withdrawal requests yet

download.title: Download OBS Studio
download.description: If OBS is already installed, proceed to the next step.
download.line1: If you don't have OBS, download it from the official site and run the installer:
download.line2: After the download finishes, open the installer and complete the setup.
download.line3: Once OBS is installed (or if it was already installed), click Next to continue.

copyCreds.title: Copy Stream Credentials
copyCreds.description: Get your Stream Key and Primary Stream URL from Stream Settings.

bullets.openSettings: Open Stream Settings in this dashboard.
bullets.copyKey: Copy the Stream Key Value (keep it secret).
bullets.copyUrl: Copy the Primary Stream URL (RTMP server).

copyCreds.screenshotAlt: Stream Settings showing Stream Key and Primary Stream URL

configure.title: Configure OBS
configure.description: Open OBS Settings â†’ Stream, select Mux, choose Global (RTMP), paste your details, then Apply.

bullets.pasteKey: Paste the Stream Key you copied.

configure.screenshotAlt: OBS Stream settings showing Mux, Global (RTMP), and Stream Key

output.title: Recommended Settings
output.description: Set Output (Streaming) for a stable 1080p stream.
output.screenshotAlt: OBS Output Streaming settings with recommended values

scene.title: Add Scene and Source
scene.description: Create a Scene, then add a Window Capture source.

bullets.addScene: Click + under Scenes to add and name a scene.
bullets.addSourceWindow: Click + under Sources and choose Window Capture.
bullets.chooseWindow: Pick the window, then confirm (eye/lock to control).

scene.screenshotAlt: OBS Scenes and Sources with Window Capture

live.title: Start Streaming
live.description: Go live from OBS and monitor status in the dashboard.

bullets.ensureScenes: Add your scenes and sources (Window/Game/Display Capture).
bullets.checkDashboard: Return here to see the preview and LIVE status.

live.screenshotAlt: OBS Controls showing Start Streaming button

tooltip.pairDesc: {asset} USDT Perpetual, using USDT as collateral
tooltip.markPriceDesc: Mark price is derived by index price and funding rate, and reflects the fair market price. Liquidation is triggered by mark price.

dialog.title: Order Placement Preferences
dialog.orderByQtyHelp: Please enter your order qty denominated in BTC terms.
dialog.orderByValueHelp: Please enter your desired order value. You can modify the required margin by adjusting the applied leverage.
dialog.noteBody: Your order quantity will be calculated based on the value of your filled order. In extreme market fluctuations, order placement may fail.

valueCost.insufficient: Not enough balance for this order. Please lower the amount or add funds.
valueCost.liqTooltip: The estimated liquidation price is affected by average entry, unrealized P&L, maintenance margin, and available balance. Multiple positions affect each other. This is for reference; liquidation triggers when maintenance margin rate reaches 100%. '--' means no liquidation price to display currently.

basic.warnNoSl: No stop loss set â€” higher downside risk

info.market: TP/SL will activate immediately after position opens
info.limit: TP/SL will activate only after limit order fills

longShort.invalid: Please enter a valid price and quantity to continue.
longShort.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. Total cost: {totalCost} USDT, Available: {availableBalance} USDT

leverage.title: Adjust Leverage
leverage.label: Leverage
leverage.warningHigh: The current leverage is too high. There is a high risk of immediate liquidation. Please adjust your position.

display.compositeTitle: Composite view - Both asks and bids
display.asksOnlyTitle: Asks only - Sell orders with current price on top
display.bidsOnlyTitle: Bids only - Buy orders with current price on top

trading.tradingRoomsDescription: Join a trading room to collaborate, share strategies, and trade

editTpSl.title: Edit TP/SL Settings
editTpSl.description: Update take profit and stop loss for your {side} position in {symbol}

errors.tpPriceRequired: Please enter a valid take profit price
errors.slPriceRequired: Please enter a valid stop loss price
errors.tpLongInvalid: Take profit must be higher than entry price for long positions
errors.tpShortInvalid: Take profit must be lower than entry price for short positions
errors.slLongInvalid: Stop loss must be lower than entry price for long positions
errors.slShortInvalid: Stop loss must be higher than entry price for short positions
errors.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before saving

warnings.noStopLoss: Warning: Trading without a stop loss increases your risk of significant losses.

info.tpCalculationDesc: When price reaches ${price}, your position will be automatically closed.
info.slCalculationDesc: When price reaches ${price}, your position will be automatically closed to limit losses.

dialog.title: Cancel scheduled order?
dialog.description: This will cancel the scheduled order. This action cannot be undone.

editTpSl.title: Edit TP/SL Settings
editTpSl.description: Update take profit and stop loss for your {side} {orderType} in {symbol}

errors.tpPriceRequired: Please enter a valid take profit price
errors.slPriceRequired: Please enter a valid stop loss price
errors.tpLongInvalid: Take profit must be higher than limit price for long orders
errors.tpShortInvalid: Take profit must be lower than limit price for short orders
errors.slLongInvalid: Stop loss must be lower than limit price for long orders
errors.slShortInvalid: Stop loss must be higher than limit price for short orders
errors.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before saving

warnings.noStopLoss: Warning: Trading without a stop loss increases your risk of significant losses.

inactive.endedDesc: The stream has ended. Please check back later or wait for the next broadcast.
inactive.offlineDesc: The stream is currently not broadcasting

messages.appearWhenActive: Stream health metrics will appear when the stream is active.
messages.collecting: Collecting stream health data... Metrics will appear shortly.

errors.waitBeforeReset: Please wait 5 seconds before resetting again

features.title: Stream Features
features.enableDvrDesc: Allow viewers to pause and rewind

reconnect.title: Reconnect Window
reconnect.description: How long to wait for reconnection before ending stream

security.title: Security Notice
security.body: Keep your Stream Key private. Anyone with this key can stream to your channel. Never share it publicly or commit it to version control.

resetKey.title: Reset Stream Key
resetKey.description: Are you sure you want to reset your stream key? You'll need to update your streaming software (OBS, Streamlabs etc.) with the new key. The current stream will be interrupted if it's active.

resetSettings.title: Reset Settings to Default
resetSettings.description: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?

preview.appearsWhenActive: Thumbnail will appear when stream is active
preview.uploadHint: Upload a custom thumbnail to preview your stream

tip.title: Tip:
tip.body: Mux automatically generates thumbnails from your live stream every 10 seconds. You can upload a custom thumbnail anytime.

active.title: Custom Thumbnail Active
active.body: Your custom thumbnail is being used for this stream.

best.title: Best Practices
best.tip1: Use eye-catching imagery for better visibility

notice.credentials: Thumbnail upload will be available once stream credentials are generated.

errors.maxSize: Image size must be less than 5MB

edit.title: Edit Room
edit.description: Update your room settings and preferences.

closeDialog.title: Close Room
closeDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently close the room and remove your data from our servers.

stream.underConstruction: Live streaming feature will be available soon!

ended.description: This trading room is no longer active. The session has been closed.
